channel.title: btc on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in btc on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Implement a Token Swap from the base chain to Bitcoin for cross-chain transactions
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Swapping ICY tokens for Bitcoin means exchanging one type of digital currency for another across different blockchain systems. Since ICY tokens (on the Base chain) and Bitcoin (on its own blockchain) operate on incompatible networks, specific tools are needed to make this process work.

item.title: How much is your ICY worth
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The value of ICY has undergone a fundamental shift. Previously, its price was fixed in terms of $USDC providing stability over the market.

item.title: How to swap ICY to BTC
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before You Begin Make sure you have a Bitcoin (BTC) wallet ready to receive the BTC after the swap. If you don’t have one, you can set up a BTC wallet using services like Electrum, Trust Wallet, UniSat or any other trusted BTC wallet provider.
